titleStmt.title: An additional act for stating and determining the accompts of the officers and soldiers of the army in Ireland
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Field, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: On F1: the last word of first line of text: 'Par-'; first word of line below initial: 'the'; the last word of last full line of text: 'the'.
Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
